short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a context menu item to search on Ecosia.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight a word or phrase on any website and right click on it to see the context menu. This addon creates a new item in the context menu which allows you to search for the highlighted word or phrase on https://ecosia.org, the search engine that plants trees! Ecosia is a not-for-profit business that earns money from your searches and donates it to tree planting schemes worldwide. How good is that!?
